price: Itasemwa: Ingieni milango ya Jahannamu mdumu humo. Basi nayo ni ubaya ulioje wa makaazi ya wanao takabari!
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
footnotes: Wataambiwa: Iingieni milango ya Jahannamu mliyo jaaliwa mkae humo milele. Jahannamu ni pahala paovu mno pa kukaa wenye kutakabari na wakakataa kuikubali Haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
